alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 02 at 1:55PM MST until February 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and the Black Hills of Wyoming and northwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A wind chill advisory means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston; Wyoming Black Hills
